name: The Tower of Ipsissimus's Optical Couplers

imgDesc.text: This tower contains highly specialized active machines and Eliphas Beam Emitters. The roofs of some floors will contain <color=#ffe14b>beam-emitting assemblies</color> that you can <color=#ffe14b>turn</color> using the corresponding mechanical valves.
The matching item to this is a specially designed beam receptor. As the name suggests, it will only be activated after it <color=#ffe14b>absorbs a beam</color> .
The wheeled assembly carrying the custom beam emitter can use mechanical means to adjust its <color=#ffe14b>horizontal position.</color>
